title: Cozy and fully remodeled 2-bedroom apartment in the Brookview Gardens.
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Brookview Gardens!', 'Second floor garden condominium in small, quiet (21 unit) Dracut complex, close to the Lowell line.', 'A quiet little out of the way place, yet convenient to everything.', 'This Upper Level unit has been recently remodeled and now features amazing recessed lighting, classic hardwood flooring thru-out, and antique white kitchen cabinetry.', 'Master Bedroom holds "king-sized" furniture too.', 'slider to balcony.', '80% of units are owner occupied, property manager on premises.', 'Laundry facilities in the building (1st floor)', 'Fee Includes: Water, Sewer, trash removal, Master Insurance, Laundry Facilities, Exterior Maintenance, Snow Removal.', 'Tenant pays electricity and gas.', '*Gas and electric bill (combined) range ~$50-$120 per month', 'Walking distance to:', 'Dr. Christos Daoulas Education Complex: 0.8 miles (Dracut High School/Jr. High School/Englesby Middle School/Brookside Elementary)', 'UMass Lowell North Campus: 1.3 miles', 'Public Transportation: 0.1 miles', "Banking (Jeanne D'arc): 0.3 miles/Banking (Enterprise): 0.3 miles", 'Hannaford (grocery): 0.9 miles', 'Appliances', 'Air Conditioning (Wall Unit)', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Oven', 'laundry in building', 'Ranger']
